Articles.Content:
Rules of that game is so simple, You just need to make Kerbalized Game names.

Example Kerb of roads 2, Kerbal engineers, Need for Jeb, Jeb: an Kerbin tail, etc. If game name is difficult you can give original name of game

I start: KSP World (DCS World)

Minespacecrafts.

Minecraft, but with Kerbal spacecrafts

Human Space Program. 

(Kerbal Space Program) 

Digbuild 

(Minecraft)

KKKKKK: a Kraken drive malfunctions, leaving a crew of 8-bit Kerbals stranded in a dimension full of spikes...

Karman line: a spaceplane must stay above the edge of the atmosphere so that it doesn't get eaten by a dragon.

Falldown: A crew must survive on Duna until they can be rescued because a landing leg broke upon landing.

Super Kerman Bros: a Kerbal in a red hat jumps over stuff to get to King Kraken and save Princess Valentina.
Faktorio: Build factories that build rockets for you.

Cities: Space Center (Cities: Skylines)

Build your very own Space Center and manage flights!

Jeb-JackKerman: You play as Highspeed runnig Jeb and you fight with evil doctor Wernher von kerman.

Bill & MechJeb. game about small engineer and defect robot who gonna save Kerbin from Destruction to create New Dres.

Edited August 2, 2016 by TedwinKnockman66
Kerbalwatch: An elite force of heroes fight against omnics MechJebs.

(This was used before in a video)
Kerbal Thunder: Kerbin civil war
Spork: Letting little Kerbals witness how the evolved to what they are now.
Half Life K: Gordon Kerman lets humans onto Kerbin by starting a rocket cascade.
KS:SO (Kerbal Strike: System Offensive) A game where Kerbals defend their space system from Space Terrorists
Kerbal chronicles (Gunman chronicles) Major Archer Kerman gonna save galaxy from General Jebediah
Kerbal Space (Dead Space): Humanity has uncovered Kerbals from an ancient planet and they take over the universe. Peacefully, of course.
Fallout K: A Kerbal wanders the lands of the KSC after a massive explosion of the stockpile of RTGs

Mun Raider (Tomb Raider, of course)

Age of Rockets (Age of Empires)

Donkey Kerbal

Kerman Bros

Missile Command (no Kerbalization needed!)
I have an entire Kerbal Universe 'canon' planned out in my head(even the Kerbal healthcare system!!!). But no arcade game names. Next thing to think of!
Kerb Wars: The Old Program (Star Wars: The Old Republic)

No Kerbal's Rocket (No Man's Sky)

A game where you fly in tiny cramped ships, explore the properties of snacks and collecting them all, and fighting off annoying MechJebs!

Kerbal Rocket Factory (Universe Sandbox 2)

A game you destroy rockets on a unimaginable scale! (but its not unimaginable it is now since you thought of it)

Kerbal Tech (Terra Tech)

A game where you build rockets and smash them together in all out duels!
K.E.R.B.A.L. Shadow of the KSC: You play as Jebediah legendary stalker who go to KSC Anomal zone few times, and who was forget about self. Sidorovich kerman included!

Kerbal: Portal, but while flying spaceships through caves (on the Mun).

Kerbal 2: ^^^ except the evil cave robot captured you and you have to escape again.

Not video games, but:

Kerb wars - Episode I - The floating-point menace

Kerb wars - Episode II - Attack of the kerbs

Kerb wars - Episode III - Revenge of the Glitch

IV - A new Mun

V - The Developers strike back!

VI - The return of the Jebi

VII - The Kraken awakens

etc.

 

Monopoly - KSP edition.

Kerbound, you escape from kerbin in a rocket to deep space and then you will fight with deep space kraken

Edited August 17, 2016 by TedwinKnockman66
Call of Delta-v

Jeb Alert 3 (Red Alert 3)

Edited August 20, 2016 by CelticCossack51
Kerballis (Stellaris): Explore what Kerbals will advance to in the future, and make contact with alien races, one of which is highly destructive and poses a threat to all life, called "Hoo-mans".
